title: [K-12] Technology-Mediated Social Studies Tutoring Using Smart Pens

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic social concepts and fundamental smartphone usage skills
context.additional_context: Sharing visual explanatory materials and supporting asynchronous learning using smartphones and smart pens

learning_goals: Learners can analyze tutorial materials written with smart pens in mobile environments with over 80% comprehension
Learners can explain relationships between social concepts in three or more ways using graphic materials provided in online tutoring sessions
Learners can review tutoring feedback materials at least twice weekly via mobile devices and improve learning outcomes by over 70%

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
